Yonkers.Cresskill Public Schools:
The Cresskill Public Schools are a comprehensive community public school district serve students in pre-kindergarten through twelfth grade from Cresskill in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States. The district is governed by a Board of Education and administered by a Superintendent of Schools, a School Business Administrator / Board Secretary and principals.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the district and its four schools had an enrollment of 1,771 students and 139.4 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 12.7:1.
